籤詩版本二:
Ọ na-esiri ike ịgbalịsi ike maka ihe ịga nke ọma, mana ụbọchị ịlụ ọgụ maka alụmdi na nwunye na-arụ ọrụ nwa oge.
N'ikpeazụ, a ga-akụ ya akụ: Onye dị ebube na-edu ndị mara mma.
詩意:
Hexagram a na-anọchi anya ngọzi na ngbanwe.
Ihe niile dị mma.
解曰: Mgbanwe kpachapụrụ anya. Enron na njedebe. Ọ bụrụ na ị jụọ maka ojiji. Naanị nso ndị ama ama.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ntụnye akwụkwọ Jiang Wei (Nkwanye akwụkwọ Jiang Wei)
Jiang Wei (202-264), site n'ikike aha Boyue, bụ onye Ji County, Tianshui County, Liangzhou (nke dị ugbu a Gangu County, Tianshui City, Gansu Province).
N'ime oge nke alaeze atọ, Kong Ming duuru ndị agha ya site na ugwu Qishan ugboro isii ịwakpo Cao Wei. Kong Ming nwere nnukwu ọrịa ma nọ n'ọnọdụ siri ike. Ọ kuziri Jiang Wei isiakwụkwọ iri abụọ na anọ nke Akwụkwọ Agha, na-atụ anya na ọ ga-eketa ihe nketa ya.
(Ihe atụ nke akụkọ a bụ na e ketara Jiang Wei n'ihi ihe ụfọdụ)
聖意: Ezi uba maka ezinaụlọ, uba, azụmahịa, alụmdi na nwunye, Liujia, ndị nwoke ji ụkwụ aga erutebeghị, Tiansi Zhongping, Liu anụ ụlọ, Zhongping, na-achọ ndị mmadụ, ikpe ọha, ịkwaga n'ezi omume, ihe onwunwe furu efu, ọrịa Eastern, ili Xingxingshan dị mma
古人: Nkwanye akwụkwọ maka Jiang Wei (akwụkwọ nye Jiang Wei)
第X籤: Banye aka na nke iri na otu
